You are basically telling us to do the same things that folks like Dave Ramsey and Dave Robbins tell us to do.   Decide what goal(s)/dream(s) you want to achieve and then decide how you will reach them.   Set the plan in place to do so and follow the plan.  While you didn't specifically say so, a key part of this is to make sure your plan is achievable by breaking it down into realistic steps so that you don't get overwhelmed by looking at a giant goal.
